meanings.sent1: The teddy bear was so huggable with its soft fur.
meanings.sent2: Children love to cuddle with huggable stuffed animals.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked huggable enough to make anyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The cozy blanket felt huggable, wrapping me in warmth.
meanings.sent5: She described the friendly cat as the most huggable creature she had ever seen.

meanings.sent1: The big pillow was huggable and perfect for snuggling.
meanings.sent2: The soft fabric of the blanket made it huggable for anyone.
meanings.sent3: The oversized teddy bear was so huggable that it made everyone want to hug it.
meanings.sent4: The warm fireplace created a huggable atmosphere on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy clouds in the sky looked huggable, like giant cotton balls.
